overview: Smoking hot firemen in their uniforms have always had a certain allure, but this particular Prague “watch” raises that interest to a whole new, spunk-inducing level for a second time. With their cute faces and young, toned physiques they’re exactly the kind of fellows who you’d want to have rescue you if the need ever arose. But it’s when these boys get their oversized hoses out that things turn incendiary once again doused only by oodles of hot jizz!
title: Fire Me Down
